overview: The Godmother (1972. 62 min., Tina Smith, Ann Ali, Keith Erickson) is a lost hardcore sexploitation rarity loaded with big tits and gritty sleaze! Two of the starlets form legendary big-tit short film Breast Orgy team up to take revenge on a heroin dealer responsible for their friend's death. Voluptuous print model Ann Ali, who had only a few career film appearances is a sight for sore eyes as she rocks both striptease and hardcore sex scenes. Equally alluring is Tina Smith whose heavy tits defy the laws of gravity!
title: The Godmother
